minions.name: CS 1110 : Intro to Computing Using Python
minions.desc: A very weak minion indeed. Simply powerful enough to get you started.

minions.name: CS 2024 : C++ Programming
minions.desc: A useful minion indeed. Everyone could use a little C++ in their lives.

minions.name: CS 2043 : UNIX Tools and Scripting
minions.desc: A useful minion indeed. This minion will help save you time and effort

minions.name: CS 2048 : Intro to iPhone Development
minions.desc: aha, an iPhone app you wish to make! This minion is just the beginning.

minions.name: CS 2110 : OOP and Data Structures
minions.desc: A step up from the CS 1110 minion, but still a weak minion indeed.

minions.name: CS 2800 : Discrete Structures
minions.desc: A step up from the CS 2110 minion. I hope you like your computer science theoretical.

minions.name: CS 2850 : Networks
minions.desc: This minion has superior knowledge of the world around it. Maybe it knows what coming.

minions.name: CS 3110 : Functional Programming and Data Structures
minions.desc: A step up from the CS 2800 minion.  Arguably the best minion in the game.

minions.name: CS 3152 : Intro to Computer Game Architecture
minions.desc: aha, a game you wish to make! I'm surprised you got ahold of this minion.

minions.name: CS 3410 : Computer System Organization and Programming
minions.desc: A step up from the CS 3110 minion. Hardware is the name of the game.

minions.name: CS 4110 : Programming Languages and Logics
minions.desc: This is a powerful minion indeed. It speaks the language of all other minions.

minions.name: CS 4152 : Adv. Topics in Computer Game Architecture
minions.desc: A step up from the CS 3152 minion. Play a game you shall!

minions.name: CS 4320 : Intro to Database Systems
minions.desc: A powerful minion indeed. This stores minion stores data for other minions.

minions.name: CS 4321 : Practicum in Database Systems
minions.desc: A companion minion to the CS 4320 minion. Embrace the data!

minions.name: CS 4410 : Operating Systems
minions.desc: A step up from and good friends with the 3410 minion. An omniscient minion.

minions.name: CS 4700 : Foundations of Artificial Intelligence
minions.desc: A powerful minion indeed. Slowly becoming smarter than you.

minions.name: CS 4820 : Intro to Analysis of Algorithms
minions.desc: A step up from the CS 4410 minion. A minion of strategy.

spells.name: All-nighter
spells.desc:
They've done it again. Poorly planning their assignments cause
you to lose sleep.  But hey, now they're ahead.

spells.name: Group study
spells.desc: Everybody heads to Olin for the study session of a lifetime.

spells.name: Naptime
spells.desc: A refreshing nap has rejuvenated you.

spells.name: Rager
spells.desc: You and your irresponsible friends go out to an epic party.

spells.name: Office hours
spells.desc: You attend office hours and your grades benefit

weapons.name: Prelim
weapons.desc: Oh no, not a prelim! *Cue Panic*

weapons.name: Final exam
weapons.desc: 35% of their grade depends on this exam

weapons.name: Forgotten prerequisite
weapons.desc: Now they have to reformulate their current and future schedules.

weapons.name: Forgotten assignment
weapons.desc:
They didn't read the syllabus, and now their work load will
make them suffer this week.
